io.nem.symbol.sdk.api

Interface SearcherRepository<E,C extends SearchCriteria<C>>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Searcher<E,C>
    All Known Subinterfaces:

    All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface SearcherRepository<E,C extends SearchCriteria<C>>
extends Searcher<E,C>
    Utility helper that stream pages of searches into an Observable.

    A streamer will help users to walk through searches without knowing the underlying pagination implementation.

    • Method Summary
